description: This Dart source file defines the BoardView widget and related classes for rendering the game board of a 2048 puzzle game in Flutter. It includes layout, animation, and styling for the tiles and background grid, and references other classes such as Board, Tile, GameProvider, and Anim for game logic, tile data, state management, and animation constants.

classes.name: BoardView
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that renders a 4x4 game board with animated tiles, adaptive layout, and visual styling.

classes.name: _GridBackground
classes.description: A widget that draws the static grid background with empty cell placeholders.

classes.name: _TilesLayer
classes.description: A widget that stacks and animates individual tiles, handling their position and z-ordering.

classes.name: _AnimatedTile
classes.description: A StatefulWidget managing spawn and merge animations for a tile.

classes.name: _TileView
classes.description: A widget that displays the tile with its value, styling, and shadows.

classes.name: _TileColors
classes.description: A helper class providing color schemes for tiles based on their value.

methods.name: _extractTiles
methods.description: Extracts and sorts tiles from the Board into a list for rendering.

methods.name: _playSpawn
methods.description: Triggers spawn animation effects for a new tile.

methods.name: _scheduleMergePop
methods.description: Schedules a quick scale pop for tiles when merging occurs.
